name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs and node-gtk

scripts.lint: yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/lib run lint && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/cli run lint && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-base run lint && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-typescript run lint && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-html-doc run lint
scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull
scripts.publish:next: yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach -v npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag next --access public
scripts.publish:latest: yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach -v npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag latest --access public
scripts.test: yarn build:all && yarn test:girs:all && yarn validate:examples && yarn start:cli-examples:all
scripts.test:girs:all: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:all && yarn validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gjs: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:vda1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:vda1 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:vda1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:vda1 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gtk2 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gtk2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gtk2 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk3: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gtk3 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gtk3: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gtk3 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gtk4 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gtk4 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk3+gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gtk3+gtk4 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gtk3+gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gtk3+gtk4 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gio: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gio && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gio: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gio && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:vte4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:vte4 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:vte4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:vte4 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:modemmanager1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:modemmanager1 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:modemmanager1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:modemmanager1 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:timezonemap1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:timezonemap1 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:timezonemap1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:timezonemap1 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:rygelcore2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:rygelcore2 && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:rygelcore2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:rygelcore2 && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gcalc: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gjs:gcalc && yarn validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node:gcalc: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:node:gcalc && yarn validate:types:node
scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:generators && yarn build:cli
scripts.build:generators: yarn build:generator-base && yarn build:generator-typescript && yarn build:generator-html-doc
scripts.start:cli-examples:gjs: yarn workspace ts-for-gir-glib-2-spawn-command-example run start && yarn workspace ts-for-gir-gio-2-cat-promisify-packages run start
scripts.start:cli-examples:node: yarn workspace ts-for-gir-node-glib-2-spawn-command-example run start && yarn workspace ts-for-gir-node-gtk-gio-2-cat-promisify-packages run start
scripts.clear:build: yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/cli run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/lib run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-base run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-typescript run clear:build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/generator-html-doc run clear:build

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
